contextual_notes: The user is searching for caregiver services in Accra, Ghana, which may limit the availability of certain international agencies.
The user seems to have a clear understanding of their needs, which helps in directing the conversation effectively.
general_insights: Providing detailed, localized information can significantly enhance user satisfaction.
Clarifying user needs early in the conversation can lead to more targeted and satisfactory responses.
Maintaining a consistent level of detail and relevance in responses is crucial for sustaining high satisfaction.
